subject: Cooking
title: Freeze-Drying: Removing Water Without Heat
description: A quick win: understand Freeze-Drying: Removing Water Without Heat.

hook.text: Astronaut ice cream weighs almost nothing and lasts decades. The secret? Sublimation.

buildup.text: Freeze-drying freezes food solid, then drops pressure so ice converts directly to vapor ‚Äî skipping liquid.

discovery.text: Without liquid water, bacteria can't grow. Freeze-dried food retains 97% of its nutritional value.

twist.text: The process was invented for blood plasma transport in WWII ‚Äî food came later.

climax.text: Today, freeze-dried ingredients are used in instant coffee, camping meals, and emergency rations.

punchline.text: Remove the water, keep everything else. That's freeze-drying.
